timing: School operates from 8:30 AM to 3:30 PM, Monday to Friday. Saturday is a half-day from 8:30 AM to 12:30 PM.
subjects: Subjects offered include Mathematics, Science, English, Social Studies, Computer Science, Hindi, Sanskrit, Physical Education, Art, and Music.
library: The school library operates from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM and contains over 20,000 books, digital resources, journals, and research materials.
sports: Sports facilities include Football, Cricket, Basketball, Volleyball, Athletics, Badminton, Table Tennis, and Indoor Chess.
principal: The Principal of the school is Dr. R. Sharma with over 20 years of academic leadership experience.
vice_principal: The Vice Principal is Mrs. Kavita Rao, responsible for academic coordination and discipline.
admission: Admissions open every March. Applicants must submit required documents and may attend an entrance assessment.
fees: Fee details vary by grade level. Contact the accounts department for the latest fee structure.
transport: The school provides GPS-enabled bus transport services across major city routes.
canteen: The school canteen offers healthy, hygienic vegetarian meals and snacks.
uniform: Students must wear the prescribed school uniform on all working days. House uniforms are worn during sports events.
exam: Examinations are conducted quarterly, half-yearly, and annually along with continuous assessments.
attendance: A minimum of 75% attendance is mandatory to appear for final examinations.
clubs: Clubs include Robotics Club, Eco Club, Debate Club, Science Club, Literary Club, and Music Club.
events: Major events include Annual Day, Sports Day, Science Exhibition, Cultural Fest, and Independence Day celebrations.
holiday: The academic calendar includes summer vacation, winter break, and government holidays.
facilities: Facilities include smart classrooms, laboratories, computer labs, auditorium, playground, medical room, and counseling center.
lab: The school has fully equipped Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and Computer laboratories.
medical: A medical room with a trained nurse is available during school hours.
counseling: Professional counseling services are available for academic and personal guidance.
pta: Parent-Teacher Meetings are conducted every term to discuss student progress.
scholarship: Merit-based and need-based scholarships are available for eligible students.
discipline: The school follows strict discipline policies to maintain a safe and respectful environment.
mission: The mission is to provide holistic education fostering intellectual and emotional development.
vision: The school aims to develop responsible global citizens through quality education.
contact: Contact the school office at +91-XXXXXXXXXX or email info@school.edu.
website: Visit the official website at www.schoolname.edu.
career: Career guidance sessions are conducted for senior students regarding higher education and career planning.
hostel: Separate hostel facilities are available for boys and girls with 24/7 supervision.
security: The campus is monitored with CCTV surveillance and trained security personnel.
smartclass: All classrooms are equipped with smart boards and digital learning tools.
results: Exam results are published online through the school portal.
idcard: Students must carry their school ID card daily.
leave: Leave applications must be submitted in writing or through the parent portal.
